thread.title: Fire hits mall in Quezon City
thread.title_full: Fire hits mall in Quezon City

title: Fire hits mall in Quezon City
text:
Fire hits mall in Quezon City (philstar.com)   3:28pm Fire at Trinoma Mall in Quezon City. Photo from Grez Claveria 
  A blaze hit a mall in Quezon City on Monday afternoon. 
Firefighting volunteer TXT Fire Philippines said the fire was reported around 2:23 p.m. 
By 2:25 p.m., TXT Fire reported that it has reached first alarm and at 2:34 p.m. it was raised to second alarm. 
Quezon City fire marshall SFO4 Albert Flores confirmed that the fire has reached second alarm as of posting. IN PHOTOS: Fire at Trinoma Mall in Quezon City | photos via Grez Claveria pic.twitter.com/lQxrAMMj2g 
— The Philippine Star (@PhilippineStar) March 13, 2017 Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 Firetrucks are already deployed to extinguish the fire at Trinoma Mall in QC. | photos via Alvin Dumduma pic.twitter.com/bCaZz5LVPj 
— The Philippine Star (@PhilippineStar) March 13, 2017 
Radio reports said the mall was closed due to the ongoing fire. — Rosette Adel Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1
